author: Shane Hutzler

text:
This is beautiful. The calm start has a sense of tranquility and sorrow to it but then the song starts to change its tone at 1:06, suddenly becoming more intense and building up. It's as if the sorrow has turned into anger and  becomes a slow descent to madness. And at the peak of intensity, it suddenly changes its tone again at 1:35. This time it's not as intense as the previous part but not as mellow yet similar to the first part as well. It's like a sense of hope and strong spirit counteracted the descent to madness but the sorrow is still there.

This should be theme of Soma Cruz. It describes his fate almost perfectly.
